Vulois/Terminess/Octociz and Bronco

Vulois looke around the battlefield. Finaly an oppurtunity to test 
out his TM3 body. He turned to Tank mode, firing missles around the 
battlefield, but primairily at Unitron.

______________________________________________________________________

Terminess smiled to herself. A battle had broken up. She was not a 
good warrior. So she was going to test out her new manu-guns. She got 
into the chair and the large helmet went over her, giving her a 
picture of the battlefield. She activated the manu-guns, 3 huge 
Bazooka type weapons. She decided to try them out on Unitron, and 
would change to a different bot later. She began firing.

______________________________________________________________________

Bronco smiled.

"Times up, octociz. Now you die."

Bronco raised his blaster right at Octociz. Octociz had prepared to 
die. But than Bronco's hand shook, and he pulled the gun away. He 
looke sad.

"I...I can't kill you. I feel something for you, like I know you from 
somewhere.

"We'll let me help. Maybe we can find something."

It looked like Bronco was going to co-opertate with Octociz, but a 
mesage came from Iron Raptor, stating that he had won and the would 
give him the tracking computer. Suddenly that fragile bot had gone 
back to the hatred filled Bronco he was before. He sent a message 
back to Iron Raptor.

"I will give you one more mega-cycle. If I don't get my computer, I 
will kill him."

"But....," said Octociz, "But I thought you wanted my help?"

"SHUT UP! I don't need your help. Anything that i used to know or was 
is gone. I want to be Bronco, and that's who I'm going to be. I won't 
hesitate again. You have one mega-cycle."

The look of small hope turned to dispair again. Octociz only hoped 
that Iron Raptro would get here in time.
